record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - July 10, 2007)

[Page: S8963]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Senator McCain's legislative fellow, Navy LTC Fitzhugh Lee, be granted floor privileges during the first session of the 110th Congress.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that my Defense fellow, Mr. Rob Elliott, be given full floor privileges for the remainder of the debate on the fiscal year 2008 Defense authorization bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Jill Antonishak, a fellow in Senator Harkin's office, be granted floor privileges for the duration of consideration of H.R. 1585, the National Defense Authorization Act for 2008.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Nicholas Greenway and Eugene Lipkin, interns in Senator Warner's office, be granted floor privileges for the period July 10 through August 3, 2007.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that Mark Paolicelli, a fellow on my staff, be granted the privilege of the floor for the duration of consideration of the fiscal year 2008 Defense authorization bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
